aria-label.description: aria-label for the <ul> element that wraps the SimpleList items.

children.description: Content rendered inside the SimpleList (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the SimpleList container

isControlled.description: Indicates whether component is controlled by its internal state

onSelect.description:
Callback when an item is selected (Type: (
  ref: React.RefObject<HTMLButtonElement | null> | React.RefObject<HTMLAnchorElement | null>,
  props: SimpleListItemProps
) => void)
